com.reliablerabbit.ejg
Class Game

java.lang.Object
  com.reliablerabbit.ejg.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.WindowStateListener

A class to handle GUI and game state management.

Author:
Mohammad El-Abid

public void setGameState(com.reliablerabbit.ejg.GameState nextState,

Change the game state

Parameters:
nextState - Game state to change to
push - Push the current game state onto the game state stack? (allowing back() to come back to current state)

back

public void back()
Return to the previous game state.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - When there is no previous state.

exit

private void exit()
This method is called as the JFrame is being closed. It is abstracted here because Mac does not fire the windowStateChanged event for closing.
